revised_title: Hygrometric Methods: A Comprehensive Study of Saturation and Chemical Methods, and Dew-Point Instruments
tldr: This report examines various hygrometric methods, including saturation and chemical methods, and evaluates the performance of dew-point instruments. The study focuses on determining the pressure of water vapor in the air and discusses the efficiency of drying tubes, the behavior of dew-point instruments, and the accuracy of chemical methods in comparison to tabulated vapor pressures.
